H0.text: Nest building is the movement of some whales traveling to colder water when ocean waters become too warm.

H1.text: Hunting is the movement of some whales to colder water when ocean waters become too warm.

H2.text: Migrating is the movement of whales to colder water when ocean waters become too warm.

H3.text: Hibernating is the example of whales traveling to colder water when ocean waters become too warm.

A4.text: Temperature is a driving factor of migration that is dependent on the time of year.
